name: SICK or TREAT
description:
Warning: Game contains cartoon violence against children (you're shooting candy at them!)

NOTE: Game will probably run better if downloaded. 

You're the only town around with trick or treating happening in 2020! Grab your candy rifle, chocolate bar launcher, and pumpkin bomb and make sure the kids don't get to your porch! 

Game has local and online leaderboards! See if you can get the top score!

Game can be played with mouse and keyboard. Also tested with xbox one controller.

Controls:
Mouse/Keyboard:
Look Around: Mouse movement
Fire weapon: Left Mouse
Skip cutscene: space
Pause Menu: Right mouse button or Escape
Change weapon: Mouse wheel or Q/E

GamePad(Xbox)
Look Around: Right Thumbstick
Fire weapon: Right Trigger
Skip cutscene: A
Pause Menu: Start
Change weapon: Left bumper/right bumper

Credits/Assets:
